page.title: 01Home Life
page.content: My favourite breakfast is Rice Crispies.At school l have sandwiches and a biscuit and a drink. For tea l have potatoes, sausages and a chop and a cup of tea. For my supper l have toast and then l go to bed. My favourite toys are Barby and Ken. I have a toy caravan too. I have football and plenty of books to read. I have a bike and I ride it every day. I sleep with my favourite teddy bear called Fred. In my home l have two bedrooms, one lounge, one kitchen and two toilets, one inside and one outside. I have an attic upstairs and a television downstairs. In my house l have seven rooms in all. It is worth 12,950 pounds. I get up in the morning at seven o'clock and go downstairs. I go in to my kitchen and have my breakfast.
